string.original: Why is the Grain counter showing Zero at Feeding Stage?

UPDATE:

We are pleased to let you know that this issue has been fixed.

==============

We heard that the Grain counter from the Rooster Coop is showing zero when at Feeding Stage. Our team is aware of the issue and it will be corrected soon.

There is no need to write to support about this.
Why did my National Fair or State Fair Reset?
We are receiving reports from some farmers that their Fair resets. We are aware of this matter and will have this corrected soon. There is no need to write to support about this.
Why am I getting the same requests from Customers in the Spring Boutique?

We have received reports from our fellow farmers that Spring Boutique Customers are requesting the same order repeatedly. We are aware of this and will have it corrected soon. There is no need to write to support about this.
Why are the Homes Brochures not counting towards the Home and Heart! Quest?

We heard that the Homes Brochures are not counting towards the Home and Heart! Quest (A Mom-umental Shift! 4/8). Our team is aware of the issue and it will be corrected soon. There is no need to write to support about this.
Why did the Rich Order Board reset ahead of schedule?
We heard that the Rich Order Board has prematurely reset. Our team is aware of the issue and it will be corrected soon. There is no need to write to support about this.
Why am I not getting the Farm Bucks after pinning FarmVille 2 on my shortcuts?

We've heard that some farmers are not getting the Farm Bucks after pinning FarmVille 2 on their shortcut. Closing the pop-up then pinning FarmVille 2 will not work.

Please follow these steps to make sure that you will receive the rewards:

  • Click on the "Get Rewards for FREE" at the left side of your farm.


  • On the pop-up screen, click on Open Facebook.


  • Once you are on your Facebook Feeds, please pin FarmVille 2 on top. Then reload your farm by clicking on the shortcut.
Why are my Heirloom Peach Trees and Heirloom Pecan Trees not counting towards the Wedding Favors quest?

Heirloom Peach and Pecan Trees that are on your farm before the quest was released will not count towards the Wedding Favors quest. You need to purchase new Trees and prune them for them to count towards the quest and move you to the next set of task on the Wedding Favors.
Why are my completed tasks not counting towards the Wedding Favors quest?

We have heard that players' completed tasks are not showing on the Wedding Favors quest. This is a display issue that we are actively working on but rest assured that you will still receive the Gift Points once you complete the four tasks. There is no need to write to support about this.
Why didn't all designs get unlocked after completing the Dream Renovation tasks?

We've heard from some farmers that certain designs did not get unlocked after completing the required number of tasks in the Dream Renovation. We are aware of this matter and will have this corrected soon. There is no need to write to support about this.
How do I enable Flash Player on my browser?

Here are the (FAQs) Frequently asked questions about activating Adobe Flash to play FarmVille 2


1. What is Adobe Flash?

Adobe Flash is a piece of software that helps run FarmVille 2 on your browser (i.e., Chrome or Firefox). It is what allows you to see and interact with all the lovely crops, animals, decorations, etc., on your farm.


2. Why do I have to activate Flash now?
If you’ve been playing FarmVille 2, it means that Flash has so far had permission to run on your browser all this time. However, recent changes made by Adobe mean that you will need to give it permission to run once more on your browser. Without doing this, you won’t be able to access your farm, and that would break our hearts. :(


3. Will I have to keep giving it permission to run?

No, this should be a one-time step if you choose “Always Allow” on Chrome or “Allow and Remember” on Firefox. This will ensure that your browser remembers your choice every time you play the game!


4. Will my farm be safe?
FarmVille 2 has always run on Adobe Flash. Giving it permission to be activated again will ensure that your farming experience will continue to be the same it was before. Without it, your farm won’t be able to load again.


5. How do I activate Flash to play again?
For Firefox users:

  • Click on the words “Activate Adobe Flash”
  • Choose “Allow and Remember”
  • Refresh the page to play
  • Click here to follow the steps


For Chrome users:

  • Click here to follow the steps.
Why am I getting 45 Fertilizers from the Fertilizer Shed?

We've received reports from our farmers that the amount of fertilizers they get from the Fertilizer Shed has decreased to 45.

Rest assured that your Fertilizer Sheds are giving the correct amount of fertilizers. The progress bar inside the shed is for the number of Adult Animals that players need to feed before the Fertilizer Shed becomes ready.
What can I do when the loading bar is stuck or when encountering Whoops-a-Daisy error?

We have received reports from some farmers that they are stuck at the loading bar or encountering Whoops-a-daisy errors in the game.

We recommend that you switch to Google Chrome to play the game. 

Click here for more troubleshooting steps.
Why are the names not visible in the State Fair League?

We have received reports from our fellow farmers that the list of the people they are competing with their leagues has no names. Some are displayed as 'Farmer joining soon' and some are displayed as numbers.

We are aware of this matter and this will be corrected soon.
Why am I unable to purchase game currency in my game?

To protect both our users and our company from attempts at credit card or payments fraud, we have implemented screening systems which can lock users out of payments based on a number of criteria. 

There are two basic types of purchasing blocks: 

Temporary Purchase Blocks
These can be applied to your account if you have had a previous purchase attempt that was declined, or if you have exceeded the number of times that you can make purchases for the day. 

These will automatically expire after roughly a 24-hour period. Please note that this period may be longer depending on whether you have exceeded a daily, weekly or monthly purchasing limit. 

Permanent Purchase Blocks
Because we do not wish to compromise our systems detection methods, we cannot go into specific detail surrounding why your account has been blocked. We can only tell you that something unusual in your account or account history triggered our system to permanently lock you out. Basically, our system can no longer trust that payments initiated by your account will settle or account activity suggests that your credentials have been compromised. For further assistance on this matter, you may contact our hotline at 1-800-762-2530.
What is FarmVille2 X-Press?

We know you’ve had trouble farming due to all the issues and permissions required to use Flash. Our team has been working hard to make sure that you have the least trouble farming hence, we have come up with FarmVille2 X-Press to fix all Flash Player-related issues that hinder your farming experience.

FarmVille 2 X-Press is the latest and the most secure Extension by Zynga that’s on the Chrome web store. This Extension is your go-to solution for all the permissions and issues caused due to Adobe Flash. Not just that! This Extension also gives you easy access to the helps from friends while you’re away from your farm and also notifies you with all the updates from your farm. And all that while winning awesome rewards too!

The FarmVille2 X-Press will give you:
  • A super seamless entry to the game.
  • Easy access to get help from friends.
  • Never miss a notification from FarmVille 2.
How do I Install FarmVille2 X-press?

Step 1:
Click here to add FarmVille 2 X-Press extension in Chrome.

Step 2:
Click on the “ADD TO CHROME”.


Step 3:
A pop- up “Add FarmVille2 X-Press” will appear. Click on “Add Extension” button.


Step 4:
On your right hand top corner you will observe a pop-up “FarmVille2 X-Press has been added to Chrome”. You can then close the pop-up.


Step 5:
Click on the FarmVille2 X-Press extension icon.


Congratulations, you have added FarmVille2 Extension successfully!
How is FarmVille2 X-Press going to help me and why do I need this?

Adobe Flash, a software that FarmVille 2 runs on is being withdrawn from the most commonly used browsers (Ex: Chrome, Firefox, etc.) and needs multiple permissions from you to access your game. Due to this, it will be difficult for you to keep farming seamlessly like before. Hence, adding the super secure X-Press Extension to your browser helps you do away with the continuous permissions required by Adobe Flash and helps you get be to farming normally, while being super safe as well!
Is this an official Zynga Extension?
Yes, this is latest and the most secure Extension from Zynga to help you out with all the Adobe Flash issues that you might face in the near future.
Why does it need permission to my browser history, camera, notification, etc.?

Now, in order for you to add this extension from Google Chrome store, we have to abide with the Chrome store policy. It is only to fulfill the policy that we need this permission.

This is how the FarmVille2 X-Press works, the extension searches for flash settings in Chrome and enables Flash while the game loads. For the extension to perform this function Chrome needs a set of permissions. This permission is required by Chrome to only perform the above tasks and we assure you that Zynga in no means will be using any of the permissions you grant but ONLY work towards giving you seamless farming experience.
How safe is it to add this extension?
This Extension is super safe and secure.
Is there an alternate way to play the game?

Yes, there is an alternate way to play the game. That is, manually enable Flash on every session on game play.

It is through the years of trust and love that we keep farming and growing with you down the years! Thank you and keep farming.
What is FarmVille 2 Top Rail?

As we continuously strive to provide the best game experience to our valued farmers, we're so happy to introduce to you the new FarmVille 2 Top Rail! With this, getting help and lending a hand to your friends are made easier than before!

Q: What is FarmVille 2 Top Rail?

A: FarmVille 2 Top Rail shows all FarmVille 2 feeds from your Facebook friends and allows you click & claim items without having to leave or refresh your Farm.

Note: You will be able to interact with the Top Rail only after your farm completes loading.

Q: How can I access the FarmVille 2 Top Rail?

A: FarmVille 2 Top Rail is located just above your game screen.

Note: Top Rail would be available by accessing the game on either FarmVille 2 X-Press or FarmVille 2 Beacon.


Q. How soon will these items show in my Farm?

A. The items should be instantly available in your Farm. But in a few rare cases, it may take a few minutes for the items to appear in your inventory.

Q. Is FarmVille 2 Top Rail available on Zyngagames.com?

A. The Right Rail on Zyngagames.com would still remain, hence FarmVille 2 Top Rail is not available on Zyngagames.com.
FarmVille 2 Launcher FAQ

What is FarmVille 2 Launcher?

FarmVille 2 runs on Adobe Flash, and we are aware that some farmers have had trouble accessing their farms since web browsers started revoking support for Flash. To ensure that our players can keep attending to their farm, we developed our secure FarmVille 2 Launcher. Once it is installed, you won't have to keep allowing the Flash to run every now and then.

For now, the FarmVille 2 Launcher is only available for Windows 7 and Windows 10 users on Mozilla Firefox browser. Worry not because we are working on making it available on all other platforms.

How do I install the FarmVille 2 Launcher on Google Chrome?

Step 1: Load the game on Google Chrome browser to receive the Launcher pop-up. You will need to accept Zynga's Terms of Service to proceed to the next step.


Step 2: Upon accepting Zynga's Terms of Service, the green "Download & Install" button will enable. Click on it.


Step 3: After that, there will be a downloaded file on the bottom-left corner of your screen. Click on it to install the FarmVille 2 Launcher.


Step 4: Once the installation is finished, load your game to get the rewards.


What will happen if I ignore or accidentally close the FarmVille 2 Launcher pop-up?

Once the pop-up is ignored or closed, an icon that says "Important Notice!" will appear on the left side of the game screen. By clicking on this, you will be able to re-trigger the FarmVille 2 Launcher pop-up and get started with the installation process. This icon will then disappear upon fully installing the FarmVille 2 Launcher.
How does the Instagrower Machine from the Limited Edition Bundle work?

We'd like to let you know that once the Limited Edition Bundle is purchased, the Instagrower Machine which is included in it will automatically be activated even if you store in your Inventory.

If you wish to use the Instagrower Machine at later time, plan carefully and only purchase the bundle once you`re ready.

If for some reason you do not see the Instagrower Machine on your farm, please check your Inventory and place it immediately.
How do I use the Market Stand?

When you click the Market Stand, the "Sell Your Goods" window will open. Just click on the items you want to sell to get them queued up.

Once they are both selected for sale, just click the ‘Sell’ button and you are done.  If you have Ingredients or Crops, you can sell them in the Market Stand for Coins.

Tip: If you accidentally select something you don’t want to sell, you can cancel the sale by pressing the “X” in the top right of the Market Stand Menu.
How do I Level Up?

Once you have enough experience points, you will level up. The Level Up window will show you the items you have earned with your new level, and let you share a reward with your friends.

As an additional bonus, when you level up any of your planted crops will mature and be ready to harvest, and you will get some free coins and water.

Tip: Keep leveling to unlock new Decorations, Crops, Animals and other items.
How can I unhide my posts in the News Feed?

1. On the Facebook Home Page, hover the cursor on the News Feed tab and click the gear icon that will appear beside it. Click ' Edit Preferences'.

2. On the Preferences Menu, click ' See more options'.

3. If FarmVille 2 app is on the list, simply click the " Show" button beside it and click Done.
What does the gray exclamation point mean?

This is called the Gray Circle of Death (GCOD). This happens when your Flash Player is running low on memory. Other than expanding the amount of RAM installed in your computer, here are the recommended steps to free up some memory so you can get back to your game:

  • Close other apps running in the background
  • Reload your browser's page by tapping on the F5 button or Command + R on your keyboard
  • Enable/Disable your browser's hardware acceleration
  • Clear or optimize your browser's cache
  • Restart or reboot your computer
How do I report a suspicious player?

{nl} The FarmVille 2 Team is focused on creating a fair and level playing field for all players. Use this form to report suspicious players who you feel may be gaining an unfair advantage.  {nl} If a player is discovered to be gaining an unfair advantage, profile adjustments will take place. {nl}
{nl}
{nl}
{nl}
{nl}
{nl} Please be aware that filling this out won't generate a reply nor can we share the results of our investigation due to privacy considerations. {nl}
{nl}
